DOC.brief_summary: The trial is performed to assess the efficacy and safety of SLIT One birch for treatment of birch pollen induced allergy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Trial of SLITone(TM) Birch in Subjects With Hayfever
DOC.detailed_description: Daily rhinoconjunctivits symptom and medication scores from patient diaries, adverse events
DOC.criteria: A history of birch pollen allergy Positive skin prick test to birch Positive conjunctival test to birch Positive specific Immunoglobulin E (IgE) to birch Forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1)<70% of predicted value History of seasonal allergy interfering with study History of symptomatic perennial allergy History of emergency visit or admission for asthma in the previous 12 month
